svg.text: if the syntax is ok, schedule the job
hand the workflow over to the WFE
Execution of an activity on the Aggregator
the syntax must be ok on this level!
Execution of an activity on an NRE
there are two possibilities for this workflow: atomic or complex
execution of an atomic activity on the NRE
atomic = measure_complexity(wf), directly execute it (schedule to local execution worker)
execution of a complex activity on the NRE
complex = measure_complexity(wf), pass it to the WFE to handle it
when the activity is finished, we have to inform the WFE
somewhen later the WFE will inform us that the whole workflow is done.
execution of the job finished, inform the aggregator
the aggregator can inform the WFE that an activity is finished
activityFinished(act.id() = wf.id(), results), we got an activity in the first-place
somewhen later the WFE will inform us that the whole workflow is done.
jobFinished(wf.id(), wf.results()), this is the parent-workflow!
waitlist.insert(wf.id(), wf.results()), keep only the results, forget everything else
remove everything related to the job
